description: Built and maintained full-stack features of a healthcare provider-facing Electronic Health Record (EHR) platform, streamlining clinical workflows while ensuring efficient, scalable, and HIPAA-compliant data access.
Owned the development of an event tracking service, integrating key back-end systems to give clinicians real-time visibility into patient journeys.

Optimized PostgreSQL performance and stability by leveraging query plan analysis, restructuring joins, resolving N+1 query issues, refining transaction boundaries, and employing explicit locking strategies, reducing concurrency errors and improving API latency by up to 80% on mission-critical flows.

Utilized the Gemini API to extract financial data from complex, unstructured investor documents to create an investments reporting dashboard, featuring data-driven portfolio insights and graphical visualizations using Visx.
Leveraged AWS serverless to orchestrate an ETL pipeline for the ingestion, AI parsing, and storage of documents.
Utilized Playwright to develop robust, headless web scrapers that automate file retrieval from investor portals.

Developed a Go scheduler service for outbound emails via Sendgrid and web scraper executions, streamlining internal and client operations across different time zones and ensuring a sub-24h delivery SLA timeline to clients.
Iterated on a multi-tenant workflow orchestration and document processing platform for public sector agencies.
Built components utilizing advanced Rxjs patterns to ensure high front-end performance and code maintainability.
Deployed developer and staging cloud environments using GCP Cloud Build/Deploy, Skaffold, Helm, and GKE.
Discovered, flagged, and proactively resolved flaky asynchronous Jest tests, boosting test coverage by 20%.
Led development of a client management system from inception to production use by 40+ staff members.
Integrated 3rd party APIs such as Google Geocoding, Plivo, and Mailgun to an Express + MongoDB back-end.
Developed an email parsing automation that extracts client inquiry data and auto-generates user records in the database, eliminating manual entry and saving over 15 hours per week of onboarding time.
Engineered new major features to a whiteboard/video RTC conferencing webapp in use by 10k+ students and tutors.

Overhauled the image upload pipeline to allow for parsing and storing of 3rd-party web URLs, reducing AWS S3 bucket storage costs by 50%. Wrote RESTful endpoints and architected MongoDB schemas for core features.
Improved low-bandwidth connection robustness by implementing dynamic audio/video throttling in Mediasoup.
Wrote and deployed Python automation tests using Jenkins for WLAN functions in automotive subsystems.
Conducted manual testing using bash scripts on embedded Linux systems (QNX) with MQTT and CAN protocols.
